<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Sun's Fury](/Feats.aspx?ID=2174) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 101

**Archetype** [Bright Lion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=129)

**Prerequisites**
[Bright Lion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2172)

</column>

---

The [Old Sun Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=19) have granted you a gift in your fight against [Walkena](/Deities.aspx?ID=159). You gain the [_sun's fury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=818) focus spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can regain using the [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) activity to pray to the Old Sun Gods; if you already have a focus pool, increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. Your Bright Lion focus spells are divine spells; when you gain this feat, if you aren't already, you become trained in divine spell attacks and spell DCs, using Charisma as your spellcasting ability score.
name: Sun's Fury
